title: Energy sustainability entrepreneurship development intensive course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of the energy sector and familiarity with entrepreneurial concepts
context.additional_context: Blended learning approach combining MOOC content with real-time sessions, where learners participate in classes via personal devices and strengthen practical competencies through discussion forums and case analyses

learning_goals: Acquire the ability to model at least three innovative business opportunities in energy sustainability
Develop a feasible business proposal based on renewable energy market analysis
Collaborate with team members using online tools to discuss and present solutions for energy-related problems
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
